text: 2 Write down a formal problem specification. Weâ€™ll assume that a currency which includes the penny is fixed, with coins of value 1,v1,...v; for some k > 1. We'll work with the currency 1,10,25 in what follows, but want an algorithm that can easily be adapted to work more generally. What is an instance of the making change problem? This is an example of a minimization problem; what quantity are we trying to minimize?
